website_summaries.verdict: A more affordable option for those wanting a dog house that works well both indoors and out.
pros: Option to purchase with a green or red roof
Lightweight design allows for easy mobility when wanting to move indoors
cons: Some buyers complained that the item arrived damaged from shipping

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It's perfect for my 22lb dog. The shipment was so fast. I'm very satisfied. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble but check the roof!
customer_reviews.text: The dog houses are really cute and super easy to put together. The green is much darker than in the profile picture. The only negative was the roofs were a bit scuffed up and one had some weird fading and blue color. Not the end of the world, but was bummed that they didn’t look brand new. Just take a look when you open the box before putting together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this dog house for use on our deck. We live "on the water" so needed a plastic house. It has worked superbly well and our pup loves it! We attached it to our outside deck since it gets quite windy at times and didn't want it to blow away! At this point in time, it has withstood winds up to 50mph and lots of water splashing on it with no problem!
customer_reviews.author: kkhc

customer_reviews.title: Bought two for 15lb. JackRussell terrier
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to assemble, plastic snaps together roof needs 10 screws that are included. Roof is not easily removable for cleaning. There are large vents molded on sides and back near the roof for ventilation. Roof overhangs about 3'' all around. Seems water tight for rain with no wind. Floor plastic base measures 17"wx22" deep. Has holes in corners for vents and water washing/draining. Base is 3" from the ground. Entrance is 10" w x 16" tall. The plastic seems strong enough for intended use.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: it's perfect for what I wanted, shelter for my large cat when I'm not home and it's raining. Have filled it with an old large pillow and several old towel scraps. Looks so inviting. Of course it's for a cat and so far he has made no effort to go inside. But I know he will .. . eventually.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Not good for outside use in the winter. The plastic is very fragile and cracks easily! The screws will rust.
customer_reviews.author: judy a

customer_reviews.title: Medium green cute fairly easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the medium house. Good size for my 22lb fur baby nephew. More of a hunter green than kelly green like it looks in the picture. Not necessarily the company's fault but mine arrived with a fist size hole in the top side of box not sure why maybe easier to carry although it was a good size box it was light. One side of the roof was broken in a couple places the pieces were lose in the box. Maybe it happened during shipping. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Snuggles Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Cosy retreat for your furbaby... Good for an area already undercover
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. But actually nice house.Recommend if you need a simple retreat for your furbaby I wouldn't put this out in all the elements though because it will get too hot or cold because it doesn't have enough insulation from heat and cold, it's nice say on your porch or in some other under cover location with a nice cosy cushion to make your furbaby feel secure. Very easy to wash down
customer_reviews.author: Pinkstar

customer_reviews.title: Cutest thing!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the dog house. Cute and has air vents.... however, my dog will NOT go in it!! I even tried putting his bed from in the house in the dog house so he would believe it was safe but to no avail.... It is now just a cute yard ornament.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Standley

customer_reviews.title: Great dog house
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and sits off the ground. Easy to assemble and seems like it will last a long time.... just wish my dog liked it. But at least she will have somewhere to go if she needs shelter or shade while we’re running errands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble. Perfect for our yard. Its off of the ground so the rain drains and doesnt make its way in. I added a small pad to cuddle up with. Both my dog and cat love it. I especially love it because there is shelter if it rains and the cat, who prefers to be outside, has a comfortable spot to run to for protection. He has great shelter with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dotty

customer_reviews.title: Home for moo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little home for my outdoor cat, and he loves it! It was super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Great Little dog house for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to assemble! Not bad for the price! I keep it on my covered porch so it is less exposed to the elements. I’m not sure how it would hold up in a heavy rain. It’s also very lightweight and definitely not weatherproof or insulated, but would provide a little shade for your furry companion on a warm sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: It’s of the purchases from amazon I’m very satisfied easy assembling very nice It was a rainy day and this little cutie showed up at our door... first thing I did order this cute out door home... she loves her new place.... she’s grown cat 🐈 perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Mitra Ahmadi

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together but it the rain leaks through badly.
customer_reviews.author: Tameka L Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The plastic came in broke in 2-3 places and it said perfect for size of a beagle and my girl won’t use it because she feels cramped. It’s definitely not weather proof either and was not worth what we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Davis

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: It took a few days to get my dog used to it but now she loves it. House is well made and seems to be chill proof.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice but broken
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice house. However the package arrived damaged and there were plastic edges broken off of the doghouse.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Cute for indoors or in covered area.
customer_reviews.text: The doghouse is cute and sturdy, but not all weather. No insulation, vents allow rain to get in.
customer_reviews.author: psgt

customer_reviews.title: Pups ...get in YOUR own house!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the dog houses...but packaging could be better.... Seller was great to work with.....means alot!
customer_reviews.author: LYNDA VANCLEAVE

customer_reviews.title: Cute but came with cracks.
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable house but it came with two cracks in the roof! As well there was a label for your pet's name that came ripped. I am keeping as I have a cat in need of a warm house for nights but would not say that I am happy to receive it damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Mac Hardage

customer_reviews.title: Chipped pieces on the roof.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this second one for my mom's dog but it came with two chips on the roof. The first time I bought it for our dog, it was fine. This one however, came damaged a little so we just glued the small chips back on the roof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Decent
customer_reviews.text: I mean it's plastic so that's not really great against the cold but it's actually pretty nice and looks cute it fit my 3 adult Cats.
customer_reviews.author: Vasquez

customer_reviews.text: My dog didn’t like it she was scare of it and never used it .
customer_reviews.author: Rosha

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to put in my doggie area.
customer_reviews.author: crossmyheart

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and a great deal. Ez build. Just snap together
customer_reviews.author: mike jones

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with pieces broken off the plastic walls and screws and washers scattered loose inside the packing box very unhappy I also bought the large sun cast doghouse which was way superior in quality and arrival state. Now I have to go to all the hassle or repacking and returning. What a pain I would have given 0 stars
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Crick-furman

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: Need a house off the ground . Great fir my rabbits.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Queen56

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price. Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together Very nice looking two cats went right in it like they knew it was their's. Glad I bought it for them to keep the rain off them.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell Presley

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.  The dog likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I would call super sturdy. But it went together OK and the dog likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Micallen

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Loves!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put togethet. Terrrific buy! This is my second house since we have another furbaby!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it for outdoor..stays dry when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dog house
customer_reviews.text: My pug and chihuahua both fit in this the base is pretty sturdy .
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It’s good enough. The floor pops out pretty easily and it’s a little cracked from being in the rain, but overall it’s a pretty good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Easterling

customer_reviews.title: Pet loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made product. Has weathered very well Dog loves it
customer_reviews.author: Angie McElhannon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cat house for a feral cat that kills critters around my house. The cat is friendly and keep my yard gopher free. Since I had the cat house outside the cat hasn't left it yet. She is a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: andrea faldon

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in 30 minutes. The unit appears to be sturdy and capable of housing a small dog. For us it is housing a feral cat. After ignoring it for two days he went in as a snow storm started yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Niels Nielson

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: We used this house as an indoor cat house. We put a cat bed inside it and our cat sleeps in it everyday. It's super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and sturdy. The downfall is it isn't rain proof. Water leaks in and doesn't keep the dog and blankets dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME DOG HOUSE!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and lightweight so when you need to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Madrid

customer_reviews.title: It’s raised off the ground & waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions a little vague on putting the roof on. Like it for my new outdoor kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Browning

customer_reviews.title: Best dig house I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my 15 lb 6 y.o. cat who refuses to stay inside.
customer_reviews.author: Conb116@yahoo.com

customer_reviews.title: So cute for little dog.
customer_reviews.text: Very good price & quality. I use for my little dog Pipi. She like to stay in there.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Han

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Was easy it assemble and very durable. Most important, the dogs loves it.
customer_reviews.author: carlos t

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t match the picture mine was gray with red 🙄
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice dog house but unfortunately mine was delivered with broken parts and had to improvise so my dog could still have a good safe dog house.
customer_reviews.author: Joceylyn silva

customer_reviews.title: Box was destroyed the dog house came damage
customer_reviews.text: The box came open and the dog house was damage. The roof was broken it was missing a piece 😥
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My fourth one that I have with heaters to keep the stray cats warm in the winter and dry in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Came in wrong color, the front part broken and all the screws thrown in the box
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Rougier

customer_reviews.title: Damage
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my other dog last year, and We loved it. But this time it came a little bit broken.
customer_reviews.author: Julieta Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Lightweight in order to move around. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Rain gets into the front area. Otherwise I really like it
customer_reviews.author: sheryl j thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just like the pic!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really seen my dog go in it yet but hoping I can lure him in soon! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog House
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just the right size for my small dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute doggie house
customer_reviews.text: Very cute doggie house for my cats. The roof had two pieces that were broken, I do not want to return it, but would like to have just roof “B” piece given to me, for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it !!! It was Easy to put together!!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Happy for the purchase
customer_reviews.text: it was what I was looking for happy for the purchase thank you
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for tbe bucks
customer_reviews.text: Well built and very easy to assemble. My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this for any small pet
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my outdoucat and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Swingle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, light weight, and sturdy. Actually bought it for outside cats (that unfortunately lost their home) to protect them from the weather. I already have two and a small apt so I couldn't take them in.
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use outside for feral cats. I live in Florida and summer rainstorms are intense as well as heat. Our most consistent kitty went right in after we put it out in our back yard. He may become an indoor cat but until he trusts us, the house is his safe place.
customer_reviews.author: Reb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I got this small house for ferral cats to have a shelter over winter. I added some foam insulation on the floor and straw. The cats have been using it every night. So I’m happy they have a place to get out the winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kimba3

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a medium dog
customer_reviews.text: The interior dimensions of this dog house are about 20 in by 15 in. I cannot imagine this being for a medium dog as my 22 lb poodle would have to literally sit upright inside of this in order to fit. I don't know what they are measuring when they listen dimensions and this was a big waste of time for me to order open up and immediately have to return. I gave it a passable review only because there's nothing fundamentally wrong with the product other than it being marketed for a medium dog.
customer_reviews.author: JOBrien

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for the feral cats around my house. The 3 stars are that both packages had serious chips, cracks and damage. Luckily, my son used silicone and repaired them. Do not ship packages with the US Post Office!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Cute little house
customer_reviews.text: This is a small and cute dog house. It's cheap plastic and very light weight. I bought it for an outdoor cat and the size is suitable, but it would only work for small dog breeds roughly 15 pounds or less. Honestly, it's overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Crunchy Numbers

customer_reviews.title: Great DogHouse!
customer_reviews.text: Our 13 pound Yorkie-Poodle mix loves this dog house. He fits in it with room to spare. The dog house was easy to assemble and fits perfectly in our courtyard for the dog to have a place outside and be protected from the elements. I would definitely recommended. great price!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hopkins Pernicone

customer_reviews.title: Indoor Outdoor Dog House
customer_reviews.text: Love, love them! Well made and right color too to blend in with our house! Not for the normal Doggy, we are using them for our feral kitties who find their way to warmth. Now they have found it. Great price and perfect product to filter them out of the cold. Thank you for a great item!
customer_reviews.author: L. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Easily put together and very sturdy. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easily put together and very sturdy. Well worth the money. Outdoor cats love it too..
customer_reviews.author: srocky61

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little house
customer_reviews.text: I bought a shelter for stray in neighborhood. This reward for killing mice outside 😁 Food in bowl stays dry as does the kitty.
customer_reviews.author: cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Doggie House
customer_reviews.text: I was going to use it for my stray cats , but it arrived broken ..VERY Nice though
customer_reviews.author: sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute dog house! Well made and would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Multipoo loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived slightly chipped on the edge of the roof, but worth keeping and useful as is.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Pup Approved
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my Medium pup and she approves. Even little sis got to try it out. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Will 213

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Plastic make good insulation for cold. Installed a clear plastic curtain to keep cold draft.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Sullera

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The reason for a star off is because this house does not have a closing flap to close the door, so when it rains water can still get inside the house if you leave it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey88

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, so does my dog. I only use it for indoors
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine but company sent wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Put together quickly and easily, seems sturdy enough but I ordered green specifically and got red. I didn’t return it because it’s going to rain and I want my dog to have shelter.
customer_reviews.author: chickenblicken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!! Used for an outdoor kitty that has been wandering around our house.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Obando

customer_reviews.title: Nice little house for some lucky pet
customer_reviews.text: Nice little house for some lucky pet. My cat loves it, and the price is right. Easily put together. Go on buy it.
customer_reviews.author: munchkin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although I received the item slightly damaged, I decided to keep it. My dog loves his new dog house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for shih tzu
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dog house for a shih tzu, perfect size and sturdy. easy to assemble, my 9 year old daughtet and i put put together in less than 10 minutes. Color is as shown in the picture. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SCorona

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: way easier and more cost effective than building myself. Super satisfied with product

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This Little House is precious! I bought this for my new cat. Very easy to put together. I am using it indoors. You can dress it up. I really like it! Arrived in excellent condition.

customer_reviews.title: Cute house, leakproof too!

product_meta.title: Indoor Outdoor Dog House Small to Medium Pet All Weather Doghouse Puppy Shelter
product_meta.description: Color:RedYour beloved pet will be living large in this beautiful dog house. It has a sturdy, smooth plastic construction for easy cleaning. It has small openings that look like a screen for ventilation and ample air circulation on the sides. Here are some of the breeds that would be ideal for this pet house. American Cocker Spaniel American Eskimo Dog (Miniature) American Eskimo Dog (Toy) American Hairless Terrier Australian Terrier Basenji Beagle Bedlington Terrier Bichon Frise Bolognese Border Terrier Boston Terrier Brazilian Terrier Brussels Griffon (Rough) Brussels Griffon (Smooth) Cairn Terrier Cardigan Welsh Corgi Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Cesky Terrier Chihuahua (Long coat) Chihuahua (Short coat) Chinese Crested (Hairless) Chinese Crested (Powderpuff) Coton De Tulear Dachshund (Longhaired) Dachshund (Smooth) Dachshund (Wirehaired) Dandie Dinmont Terrier English Cocker Spaniel English Toy Spaniel French Bulldog German Hunting Terrier Glen of Imaal Terrier Havanese Italian Greyhound Jack Russell Terrier (Rough) Jack Russell Terrier (Smooth) Japanese Chin Japanese Spitz Japanese Terrier Klein German Spitz Kyi-Leo Lakeland Terrier Lancashire Heeler Lhasa Apso Lowchen Maltese Manchester Terrier (Toy) Mexican Hairless (Toy) Miniature Bull Terrier Miniature Pinscher Miniature Schnauzer Mittel German Spitz Norfolk Terrier Norwegian Lundehund Norwich Terrier Papillon Parson Russell Terrier (Rough) Parson Russell Terrier (Smooth) Patterdale Terrier Pekingese Pembroke Welsh Corgi Petit Basset Griffon Vendeen Phalene Pomeranian Poodle (Miniature) Poodle (Toy) Prazsky Krysarik Pug Puli Rat Terrier Schipperke Scottish Terrier Sealyham Terrier Shetland Sheepdog Shiba Inu Shih Tzu Silky Terrier Skye Terrier Smooth Fox Terrier Staffordshire Bull Terrier Swedish Vallhund Tibetan Spaniel Tibetan Terrier Toy Fox Terrier Volpino Welsh Terrier West Highland White Terrier Wire Fox Terrier Yorkshire Terrier
feature_bullets: Lovely house for your lovely pet Gives your puppies a feel at home
Assembles very easily with just a screwdriver in a few minutes Strong and Lightweight
Smooth surfaces for easy cleaning Attractive, safe, easy-to-assemble dwelling for your dog to call home
Durable construction Raised Floor designed to be Affordable, Durable, Easy to Assemble, and Comfortable for your pet
dimentions approximately w60 x d75 x h66 cm or about 24x30x26 inches
